metadata: (info { (description "Sai is a two-row mancala-style board game played on the island of Flores in Indonesia.") (rules "2x7 board. Four counters in each hole. Counters are captured when the final counter falls in a hole making it contain four counters. ") (source "DLP evidence.") (id "1257") (version "1.3.9") (classification "board/sow/two rows/reconstruction/pending") (credit "Eric Piette") } ) (graphics { (board Style Mancala) }) (recon { (concept "Sow" True) })
